derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek Kupris 'Aphrodite' + pedilon 'slipper'

means.word_mean: 1. genus of chiefly American perennial leafy-stemmed orchids: lady's slippers; sometimes includes species of genus Paphiopedilum
